attachments.title: :memo: Memo Emoji
attachments.text: A memorandum: a piece of paper written to used for communication in formal settings. Displayed as a piece of paper being written on with a pencil. The Apple version of this emoji contains theâ€¦

attachments.title: :writing_hand: Writing Hand Emoji
attachments.text: A right hand holding a pen or pencil and writing. Shown with a blue pen on all platforms except Apple which has a black pen. â€¦
